Better Password Settings

With this plugin enabled, user passwords will be checked against additional criteria to ensure better password selection. NIST recommends checking passwords against a blacklist and using temporary account locking after repeated password failures. Complexity requirements including specific types of alphanumeric characters are available but not recommended for UX reasons.
